legal_basis: Section 5(b) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
Section 41(1)(c) of the Canadian Human Rights Act
section 18.1 of the Federal Courts Act
reasonableness_of_decision: The Commission's decision to investigate was reasonable
judicial_review_process: Judicial review of the Commission's decision to investigate
decision_outcome: Court upheld the Commission's decision to investigate, dismissing the judicial review application
